title: Tsovinar (goddess)
extract:
Tsovinar or Nar was the Armenian goddess of water, sea, and rain. She was a fierce goddess, who forced the rain and hail to fall from the heavens with her fury.
Her name Tsovinar means "Nar of the sea".
